name: Shadowblight
description: A disease that causes the afflicted to be consumed by darkness, their skin turning black as shadows envelop their body.

name: Frostbane Fever
description: A chilling illness that lowers the body temperature drastically, causing frost to form on the skin and organs to freeze.

name: Wailing Plague
description: An infectious disease that causes the afflicted to uncontrollably wail in pain, spreading misery and despair.

name: Cursed Blood
description: A curse that turns the blood into a dark, viscous liquid that poisons the body from within, causing severe pain and eventual death.

name: Ethereal Consumption
description: A spectral illness that causes the afflicted to slowly fade into the ethereal plane, losing touch with reality.

name: Mindfire
description: A curse that inflames the mind, causing intense migraines and hallucinations.

name: Boneshiver
description: An illness that causes the bones to become brittle and cold, making movement agonizing.

name: Soulrot
description: A necrotic curse that slowly decays the soul, causing profound weakness and despair.

name: Fleshweaver's Malady
description: A grotesque illness that warps the flesh, causing it to grow uncontrollably and painfully.

name: Eldritch Pox
description: A curse that marks the skin with arcane runes, draining the life force of the afflicted.

name: Lich's Breath
description: An illness that causes the breath of the afflicted to become toxic, slowly killing them and those around them.

name: Cursed Tongue
description: A curse that renders the afflicted unable to speak without causing harm to themselves and others.

name: Plague of Eyes
description: An illness that causes extra eyes to form all over the body, driving the afflicted mad.

name: Bloodfire
description: A curse that ignites the blood of the afflicted, causing intense internal burning sensations.

name: Mindfray
description: An illness that frays the mind's connections, causing memory loss and cognitive decline.

name: Veilrot
description: A curse that causes the skin to become transparent, making the afflicted's muscles and bones visible.

name: Souldrain
description: An illness that saps the very soul of the afflicted, leaving them weak and lethargic.

name: Warped Spine
description: A curse that twists the spine into unnatural shapes, causing immense pain and difficulty in movement.

name: Dream Eater
description: An illness that causes the afflicted to be plagued by nightmares, leaving them exhausted and paranoid.

name: Gloomshade
description: A curse that envelops the afflicted in a perpetual shadow, making them invisible but draining their vitality.

name: Crimson Fever
description: An illness that causes a high fever and severe weakness, making the afflicted bedridden.

name: Gravechill
description: A curse that causes the afflicted to feel constant cold, as if they were buried alive.

name: Bonebreaker Plague
description: An illness that weakens the bones, making them prone to fractures.

name: Specter's Grip
description: A curse that causes the afflicted to be haunted by malevolent spirits, draining their will to live.

name: Mirelung
description: An illness that fills the lungs with a thick, tar-like substance, making breathing difficult.

name: Blight of Ages
description: A curse that accelerates aging, causing rapid deterioration of the body and mind.

name: Veinrot
description: An illness that causes the veins to decay, leading to severe pain and weakness.

name: Curse of the Forgotten
description: A curse that erases the afflicted's existence from the memories of others, leading to profound loneliness.

name: Wormwood Plague
description: An illness that causes a severe allergic reaction to sunlight, making the skin blister and burn.

name: Serpent's Curse
description: A curse that causes the afflicted to grow scales and fangs, but weakens their overall health.
